basics.name: Yahye Bashir
basics.label: Robotics Engineer & AI Researcher
basics.summary: A self-taught Robotics Engineer with hands-on experience in designing, developing, and deploying robotic systems. Proficient in ROS2, AI/ML, reinforcement learning, computer vision, humanoids, quadrupeds, Nvidia Isaac Sim/Isaac Lab, world models for predictive simulation, and foundation models for generalized robot intelligence. Strong team player with a passion for innovation, learning, and problem-solving in dynamic environments.

projects.name: Moria Robot
projects.summary: Developed a humanoid robot workspace at Bursa Technical University, focusing on multi-agent reinforcement learning, manipulation, and simulation. Configured URDF files, ROS2 controllers, and MoveIt for arm actuation, simulating in NVIDIA Isaac Sim to achieve stable base configurations and reduce setup time by 40%.

projects.name: Custom Quadruped (Spot) Walking Policy Training
projects.summary: Designed custom USD asset configurations with DC motor models and physics properties. Created flat/rough terrain environments with PPO training via RSL-RL and SKRL, achieving adaptive gaits that improved locomotion efficiency by 25% in simulations.

projects.name: RL Manipulation with UR10e + Robotiq 2F-140 Gripper
projects.summary: Configured UR10 and Robotiq gripper in Isaac Sim, implemented MDP for reach/lift tasks with dynamic targets. Trained models that increased task success rate to 95% for grasping and positioning objects.

projects.name: Autonomous Robot Navigation
projects.summary: Developed navigation stack using ROS2 Nav2 and SLAM with global/local path planning, enabling real-time obstacle avoidance and reducing navigation errors by 30% in simulated environments.

projects.name: Patrolling Robot (ROS2 & Gazebo)
projects.summary: Implemented autonomous patrol behavior with waypoint navigation and obstacle avoidance in Gazebo, optimizing routes to cover areas 20% faster while maintaining 100% collision-free performance.

projects.name: ROS2 Mobile Manipulator with MoveIt 2 & ros2_control
projects.summary: Designed URDF models and digital twins in Gazebo with ros2_control for hardware abstraction. Integrated MoveIt 2 for motion planning and Alexa IoT for voice control, enabling coordinated manipulation that improved task execution speed by 35%.

projects.name: RL Car Racing with DQN & Double DQN
projects.summary: Trained agents using DQN and Double DQN for racing simulations, achieving lap times 25% faster than baseline models through optimized exploration and reward structures.
